metadata.title: CVE-2020-24513 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Domain-bypass transient execution vulnerability in some Intel Atom(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure via local access. It was discovered that certain Intel Atom processors could expose memory contents stored in microarchitectural buffers. A local attacker could use this to expose sensitive information.

notes.note: sbeattie> INTEL-TA-00465 no kernel component to this issue

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20210608.0ubuntu0.21.04.1').
